description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment (S96a) to planning permission ref: 216673VAR dated: 12.05.2022 for " Minor material amendment (S.73) to vary condition no.2 (approved plans), seeking to allow changes on the design, in pursuant to planning permission reference: 172732FUL dated 18/08/2017 as varied by 178777VAR dated 28/02/2018 for the 'Conversion of two semi-detached dwelling houses into four self-contained flats; two single storey rear extensions; two single storey front porch extensions; two hip to gable roof extensions; two rear roof extensions; installation of four roof lights on the front roof slope; with associated amenity space, cycle and refuse storage'. Variation seeks alteration to the rear amenity space's landscaping, screening and retaining wall". Variation seeks alteration to the extent of the rainwater Aco drain
